page.title: 20INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: SEVERAL LOCAL PEOPLE WERE INTERVIEWED DURING OUR PROJECT WORK AND WE DISCOVERED THAT MUCH CAN BE LEARNT BY LISTENING TO OLDER PEOPLE.FOR EXAMPLE WE INTERVIEWED OUR LOCAL DEACONESS FROM ST.JOHN'S PARISH CHURCH,MRS.DIANE OSBORNE.SHE TOLD US ABOUT HER BUSY AND REWARDING LIFE.HER MAIN JOBS ARE VISITING PEOPLE IN HER PARISH AND TAKING CHURCH SERVICES.WE WOULD ALSO LIKE TO THANK MR.G.E.OSBORNE WHO WAS KIND ENOUGH TO COME AND TALK TO US ABOUT HIS LIFE IN THE AREA SINCE 1938. THIS WORK ON THE DOMESDAY PROJECT HAS BEEN UNDERTAKEN BY PUPILS FROM CLASS 10,MALDEN MANOR JUNIOR SCHOOL LED BY LINDA PALMER AND URSULA BARSINI AND BY PUPILS FROM CUDDINGTON INFANTS SCHOOL LED BY MARGARET HALL.SLIDES BY STUART DAY OF BEVERLEY SCHOOL,NEW MALDEN. INFORMATION CO-ORDINATED BY STEVE SHELDON OF BEVERLEY SCHOOL.
